sentence: It's had developmental harm, emotional harm done to them.? You might remember Starbuck as the guy that monumental pathological liar and North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn brought onto the House floor, violating House rules without a doubt.? Starbuck's wife also spoke and claimed that the plan with these mysterious pornographic books is to lower the age of consent for pedophilia.
title: Tennessee hearing on book bans goes completely sideways
